snippet: Suspicions voiced by a leading international swim coach about the remarkable Olympic performance of a young Chinese swimmer has started a huge debate. Did she perhaps dope, or did her breakout swim come through her physical gifts and a decade of hard...
abstract: Suspicions voiced by a leading international swim coach about the remarkable Olympic performance of a young Chinese swimmer has started a huge debate. Did she perhaps dope, or did her breakout swim come through her physical gifts and a decade of hard training? In Asia, some believe the debate is fueled by the West's jealousy over a rising China, and perhaps even smacks of racism.

headline.main: Debate Over Chinese Swimmer Turns Testy in Asia
